website_summaries.verdict: This compact charger base does an adequate job of charging original Wii U controllers, but may not fit off-brand “Wiimotes.”
pros: A charger base with a fairly compact design that charges Wii U remote controllers quickly and reliably within 2 hours
cons: Included battery packs don’t hold a charge as long as OEM packs
Connectors don’t seat securely with battery contacts
Off-brand remotes may not fit charger base

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I finally pulled out my old Wii and the old chargers didn't work. These chargers cradle and charge perfectly and now I am able to play some of the old games I havent played in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative to NES original equipment.
customer_reviews.text: The batteries fit very well in the aftermarket controllers. They seem to hold a charge so far. If there are any changes in the charge life in the near future I will post it on this review.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Lady 78

customer_reviews.title: Changes colors as it charges - coooooollll!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Quickly recharges wands, though they must be bare; no silicone covers. There's a ring of color you can still see around the wand when its in the charging cradle, red whwn it's needing charge, purple when its half charged; and blue when full. I'm cursed with "butter fingers" and have unfortunately d4opped it a couple times as I tried to get the wands out, boy even a scratch from it shuttering across the linoleum.
customer_reviews.author: BrowsingAddict

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: These battery packs came on time, were well packaged and complete as advertised - double charger, charging cable and 2 battery packs. Battery packs fit my old original Wii remote and we’re quick to charge. I’m very satisfied with the purchase and would recommend both seller and item.
customer_reviews.author: LCS

customer_reviews.title: The batteries are compatible with the original Nintendo controllers.
customer_reviews.text: The batteries are compatible with the original Nintendo controllers. The charger and batteries are a complete package for the original controllers to operate with an original WII console.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Ross

customer_reviews.title: Must have for wiis
customer_reviews.text: Small and does it job. The only issue is on the occasion when both remotes are low on battery one of the charging ports seems to divert power to the other so not both remotes are simultaneously charging
customer_reviews.author: Dylan S.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase and this seller
customer_reviews.text: Vary happy with this purchase. Very happy with the seller also. The price was great and shipping was fast. My grandson and I can now enjoy playing Wii games with fully charged Wii controllers and I don't have to plug the charging base into my laptop or the Wii to charge the controllers, I can now just plug into the wall outlet to charge. LOVE that!!
customer_reviews.author: rennietintin

customer_reviews.title: Charges well, LED is REALLY bright
customer_reviews.text: We used to have an induction charger, Man that sure did make charging easy. Only drawback to this design is the he'll protective cover must be removed to place in cradle. Not really a negative in my opinion. The blue LED is really bright and is basically on all the time. It almost acts as a night light.
customer_reviews.author: abbyeb

customer_reviews.title: excellent replacement for the original handset battery
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly as advertised. I was a bit hesitant to purchase a non-Wii battery, but this works perfectly. Fit exactly into the Wii handsets, charged without a hitch, excellent replacement for the original handset battery. Also, the light on the base, while a bit bright, makes it easy to see exactly the status of the charge. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: This charging station works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This charging station works like a charm! Extremely happy with the purchase. It’s made it good material and it rapidly charges the Wii U controllers. No issues whatsoever with the fit or performance of the product. I have saved a ton of money by purchasing this product!!! No more batteries!!
customer_reviews.author: lxafly

customer_reviews.title: Small Box, Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised as to how small the box was that it was shipped in, but no matter because it was all there and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Chong

customer_reviews.title: I would order again from this seller
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for the ones we bought many years ago. We love playing with the WII during the winter months. This came on time and everything was as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Estela

customer_reviews.title: Great Solution For Wii Remotes!
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have noted, the only downside to these is that the lights remain on even when the remotes are fully charged. We keep ours located in the entertainment cabinet so the lights are not an issue for us. These work great and keep us from running through batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Handing

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Are old ones were over 8 years old and just getting sticking and old so we replaced it all for a fraction of the cost. Works fine and happy to have a like new battery on the remote. Well Worth the price - great value.
customer_reviews.author: Mangels74

customer_reviews.title: Let's get charged
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these have been charging very well and the colored light from red to blue being fully charged takes the guessing out. Would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: importceo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design and works terrific!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Wal-Mart doesn't stock Wii products anymore so I was thrilled to find all our Wii needs right here! Nice design, love the different colored lights and works wonderful! Thanks so much for the prompt service!
customer_reviews.author: Linda R Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Not much I can say about these other than that they work. The batteries hold a good charge and they don't add any bulk to the controllers the way some other Wii remote batteries do. The cradle is nice and sturdy, and the lights make it easy to see when the batteries are fully charged... and let's face it the lights look pretty cool too. If you need to get batteries and a charger for your Wii remotes you can't really go wrong with this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Thompson

customer_reviews.title: "Battery Life for several days,when used with your Basic Nintendo wii motion controllers!...Thanks Kulannder!"😂
customer_reviews.text: Nice additions:AC adapter and usb cord included.two ports to charge two Wii remote controls,and two sets of 2 AA rechargeable battery packs. Set back: "These AA rechargeable battery packs are not strong enough for extended play with: the Nintendo Wii motion control(s) with the extended Motion Adapter..40 minutes tops without being reminded of low battery life.Not bad for $13.89. ✅Final user's comment: ("WORKS FINE WITH THE BASIC WII REMOTES!, Battery Life for several days!") Thanks Kulannder!!😂
customer_reviews.author: david vargas

customer_reviews.title: Charge me up
customer_reviews.text: I get sick of buying batteries! These are working great! Charges fast! Product came as described. Glad to not have to buy more batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Katie B

customer_reviews.title: Charger is unsteady and indecisive
customer_reviews.text: I’ve spent 30 minutes trying to get these to charge. I just put the included batteries into my Wii controllers so I know they should be needing charged. The charging station doesn’t seem to know what color it should be. When I am able to get it in a position it is red, it eventually turns purple. Trying to get the controllers in the right position is apparently impossible because it won’t stay correctly, and when they are in the correct position, any slight movement will cause the color to change. If I remove one charger, it’ll impact the other charger. If I remove the wristbands, it still won’t sit correctly. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Cammi

customer_reviews.title: Easy and convenient!!
customer_reviews.text: I think they work great. And my 5 & 6 yrs old love them! They're red LEDs when charging, blue when nothing is on them, and purple when fully charged. Don't know how long the charge last bcuz my kids like charging them every night, but if it takes about 1-2 hours to fully charge from a dying battery. Kids can set the remote on the charger with ease. Only thing is you have to have the station on an even, flat surface or they may not connect to the charger properly. Other than that, I would purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina S.

customer_reviews.title: Lights not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about the concept. I plugged two remotes in with the rechargeable batteries inside, and immediately the right one goes on blue light. Hmmmm, weird since it just came out of the box. Left side is red, and turns blue after a few hours which I think is what I should expect. On a hunch I then put the "fully charged" one that I had in the right side in the left side, and it shows up red. So I think the light things are messed up, and I can't trust whether or not the remotes are charged or not.
customer_reviews.author: Sfmama

customer_reviews.title: One Battery Sent was DOA
customer_reviews.text: One of the two battery packs received did not charge. The straps attached to the WII Controller needed to be removed to get a consistent charge (for the second battery). I returned this and purchased a similar device that came with 4 battery packs and could charge all at the same time (2 without a Controller). The 4 dock held the two Controllers a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H

customer_reviews.title: Worked great if it always worked.
customer_reviews.text: They worked great the first charge. See video.. when I plug in two remotes one light turns purple and sometimes the second goes purple/pink. I have to take out a remote. Then the lights go dim with one or two remotes plugged in and don't charge. I have to unplug it from the wall and plug it back in but it doesn't always eork. They don't hold a charge when the light goes dim and we can only charge one at a time now. When they do charge the work great but they don't always and I have to plug and unplug a million times. How do I fix it?
customer_reviews.author: Hettabug

customer_reviews.title: So far, I guess, so good.
customer_reviews.text: While it was packed really well, the batteries don't seem to hold the charge for that long. I can live with frequent re-charging, however, the wall USB plug-in unit that the usb cord goes into, stopped working. I had to go find a different plug unit and now it's working again. This should not be for something I only bought 2 weeks ago. Oh, well.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt fit original wiimotes
customer_reviews.text: Charges wiimotes, but barely. I have an aftermarket controller and an original controller and the aftermarket barely fits in, and the original doesn't click in at all. Took the silicone case off as expected, took the strap off, still won't fit in the charger portal. So it just kind of hovers and the lights flicker and it somehow charges, but if you walk by it'll fall out and you don't know how much it's charged or not.
customer_reviews.author: Musician

customer_reviews.title: Love saving money on batteries
customer_reviews.text: The rechargeable packs fit perfect in the white Wiimotes, but I was surprised to find that the fit is a tad bit tight in the black ones (maybe I didn't read the description well enough, I guessed I expected them to be controller color agnostic). They still work in both, but just don't fit perfect in the black Wiimotes. Regardless, would recommend & buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Double-D

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first, but the battery life doesn't last long at all. You can't really charge 2 remotes at once either. The station will say the remotes are charged, but when you go to sync them, they are on 1 battery line or almost dead. (And that's after charging them over night) I've tried charging remotes separate, together, for a short time, for a long time, and nothing seems to extend the battery life. If you are playing by yourself and can keep swapping the remotes out while the other charges, then this would work ok.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Vanover

customer_reviews.title: Loose and wonky fit - won't charge!
customer_reviews.text: I should've listened to the "wonky" fit review! Just got these today to try out my older Wii games. Batteries seemed to fit on back of remotes fine and charger lit up when plugged in. End of good news... The charger indicator lights were both red for a few seconds, then 1 blue, then other purplish, then both blue. I reinserted several times with different and changing colors each time! Remotes feel loose & rocky in charger, colors change as I move them trying to get a charging red color. No charge in batteries, but show blue every time after about 1 minute. I give up! Will be returning. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at value and quality
customer_reviews.text: We have used this for about a month now and it seems to be holding up. I was very doubtful when I first purchased this because I was worried the price would reflect the quality, but I decided to trust previous reviews; so glad that I did! My only complaint would be that the battery packs are a little difficult to remove. On the rare occasion that the pack runs low while still playing, we will just temp switch to regular batteries and it always feels as if we are going to break the remote or the battery pack in the process of removing it. Otherwise, it's does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Jonsef

customer_reviews.title: Old Batteries Died and This Was the Perfect Replacement
customer_reviews.text: The original Wii batteries in my two controllers started to no longer hold a charge. This is the perfect replacement. I've yet to run the battery down as I just set the controllers back on the charger when we're done playing. The only con I can find is that the light that are one while charging are very bright. Which is a minor inconvenience. I have the ability to unplug it when I do not need to use it. Not enough of an issue to take off a star. The product fits my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Aug

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product, Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Just received these same day I’m writing the review, so I can’t speak for the long-term reliability or battery life yet. However, this was simple to set up and is very nice. The battery was a slightly tight fit in the Nintendo remote, but they still fit snugly work fine. I only wish the blue LEDs would not stay lit up all the time as they can be quite bright in my opinion without the remotes placed on the charger. It would be nice for the light to go off when remotes are not placed on charger in my opinion and this would save on electricity as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Good, but excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Definitely convenient to be able to dock and forget about it to charge when not playing the Wii. The battery life on a full charge isn’t too great, but being chargeable is nice of course. It’s quite hard to put the battery on and removing it as well. Almost feels like it’s stuck and you have to force it on/off. It’s great for the price and I would recommend it, just don’t expect a long life span per charge Update: one of the battery pack kept disconnecting even when it was fully charged. I contacted the seller and they refunded me no questions asked and also very quickly. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Alysssakay

customer_reviews.title: It is better than buying batteries all the time.
customer_reviews.text: It is better than buying batteries all the time. I wish the battery pack lasted longer. It does not last as long as the original wii charger I had when I bought the unit. It was about three times the cost of the new one. You get what you pay for. you have to be real careful when you put the battery packs on the charger. They have to be put on just right or they will not charge. I do not regret the purchase, I just wish the battery life was longer.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Warden

customer_reviews.title: Remote dock just glows blue
customer_reviews.text: I just received the item today and as per instructions we inserted the new batteries and docked the remotes for charge. The color just keeps staying blue but doesn’t change red for charge. After some time we took it off and let our kids play the wii and after 10 mins the remotes died. We then placed it back on the charging dock and even then the color of dock is blue and not red. See pic for reference!
customer_reviews.author: iloveamazon

customer_reviews.title: Time and money saver
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. These controllers burn through batteries. These have saved me time and money. Matches the OEM controller well and the charger is attractive looking.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Chinese garbage
customer_reviews.text: cheap Chinese product........batteries went into Wii controllers just fine, but when they were put in the charging cradle, they indicated full charged (Blue light). When I moved the remotes around, the indicator light went to "red" (i.e. charging) but wouldn't remain lit unless I kept pressing down on remote. There's a reason why this was so cheap, because it is cheaply made. Don't bother time on this one. I'm going out to buy rechargeable AA batteries to use in my older remotes.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: One of the two batteries does not hold a charge for more than a half hour. And it is extremely difficult to get the remotes to sit properly on the dock to charge in the first place. I guess you get what you pay for. I just wish there were other charging stations out on the market
customer_reviews.author: Matt L.

customer_reviews.title: Works well, lighting is a good touch
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace my old charger stand and battery packs. Has worked out well, I like the lighting. Unfortunately my dog knocked it over and broke the retainers on one side to hold the controller so I can now only charge on one side. I am a little disappointed the retainers will break if the controller comes out wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a month then breaks
customer_reviews.text: Bought this April 2, May 19th it decided to stop working. It was great up until it stopped working so I can really write a negative review because it was a great product. Just not a product that lasts long. I will be looking elsewhere for a new one. Wish there was a way to get a replacement or send it back without paying.
customer_reviews.author: cmhavs21

customer_reviews.title: 45 minutes to an hour is all you get.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this thinking it would be and inexpensive alternative to buying batteries considering how much time that we would be spending in the house. The battery life is about 45 minutes to an hour. You spend more time charging them then you do playing with them. A good set of batteries will last you weeks.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to plug and play
customer_reviews.text: Day 1, 5 stars! Looks good. There were no instructions but it was all self explanatory. It looks like it would do well. When I plugged everything up it lit up immediately indicated it was doing its job. I will revisit to comment on how well the battery hold up, etc.
customer_reviews.author: LaLa’s Things

customer_reviews.title: Batteries won't fully charge
customer_reviews.text: As some have noted, batteries will not always fully charge. The base will turn blue but whe the remotes are used, 1 remote ways says low battery. Doesn't matter which controller I use, I've cleaned the contacts, etc. Giving 2 stars because of this, although one of the batteries seems to be OK. Base charger is OK and I liked that it changed colors when the chargers were "done" being charged. The remotes were a but loose in the charging station, but otherwise it was five. Would have rated much higher had both batteries actually charged correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Cedric Villat

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: this stays blue will not turn red and will not charge at all. junk I through the packaging away thinking it was a good purchase. I am diabetic and I will not be leaving to go find a package to return this in. I'm staying in and safe do to the virus. it' over a $25.00 loss
customer_reviews.author: gretty

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work, lights are on but still has no charge after being plugged in for a day.
customer_reviews.text: Package was delivered on time, yay!! But it doesn’t work.. I’ve plugged in and unplugged several times, even tried charging just one remote.. the red lights never came on.. just blue signifying fully charged- but remote lights still flash when I remove from charger and try to use them. Needless to say, kids and I are disappointed with the product. Will be returning for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: georgia wells

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, I was surprised they didn't "Fit" perfectly into the wiimotes, which is why it's not 5 star. The base has a very bright LED indicator, but it's a great way to store the wiimotes, and keeps us from going through batteries. Yeah, I know the wii is like 10 yrs old, but my 7 yo isn't getting a switch in the next year or 2...
customer_reviews.author: Paul Carhuff

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good battery replacement
customer_reviews.text: I had bought these before and they lasted a pretty good while. These new ones (2 sets) charged right up, but first time I used them one of the battery packs indicated that it was running low. How? I had just charged them both. I will use them again and hopefully won't receive another indication that they are running low so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Works ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: This product does seem to charge the controller. Getting them in the cradle just right isn't very easy and when 2 controllers are charging the light indicator doesn't work properly. This makes it hard to know when you get the 2 controllers on there just right. But when the stars align the controllers do charge.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wii batteries died and these got us playing games again
customer_reviews.text: I was worried maybe these wouldn't work and my Wii was broken... not the case, I was playing MARIO CART in no time. The LIGHT indicator very easy for OLD PEOPLE (like me) to understand... RED is charging BLUE is charged Great nightlight too..
customer_reviews.author: gmc505

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: The product works great. I took away two stars because when it was delivered, the box was saturated in this sticky oil substance that had a very pungent smell. The substance also got onto the the actual product and took me forever to clean off, even then the smell remains. But overall good product
customer_reviews.author: Lexy

customer_reviews.title: A good way to keep your Wiimotes powered.
customer_reviews.text: These rechargeable battery packs do a good job to help you save on batteries and keep your Wiimotes powered up. The only downside is that they don't seem to have as long of a battery life as using regular AA batteries in the Wiimotes normally do. I haven't found this to be an issue as I can always charge them between sessions, or swap batteries as there are two. The only time I see this becoming an issue is if you had an extended multiplayer session with all batteries in use. Overall, they have worked well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Hal

customer_reviews.title: Was going through a lot of batteries before this
customer_reviews.text: Only one side works all remotes and the other side only work with one out of 4 remotes. Was sad when I couldn’t get any of them to charge on the one side until I tried them all and found one remote that will charge on that side
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Battery pack - won't hold charge.
customer_reviews.text: I had to give some time before I wrote a review but needless to say that one battery pack won't even hold a charge. Otherwise, it works like it's supposed too.
customer_reviews.author: stacey burd

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmm, seems a little wonky...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't seem very durable or reliable. I had to really fiddle with the remote until it seemed to start charging, and then once it appeared to be charged, it wasn't at all! So I repeated the process, and it worked the second time. So it works, but it just seems a little funny.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Decay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Very sturdy. At first didn't know how to fit controller into it without it flipping back and forth between blue and red. Then figured out you have to put the wrist bands underneath and not behind the controller and the charger the it holds tight and charged great.
customer_reviews.author: SkyGuardian

customer_reviews.title: Finicky Charging Station & Loose Fitting Rechargeable Battery
customer_reviews.text: Was really excited about this product because the Wii remotes drain regular batteries fairly quickly. Unfortunately the charging station itself is quite finicky and sometimes says the remote is fully charged depending on how the remote is sitting in the charging portal. The biggest issue I have had is that one of the rechargeable batteries isn’t making good contact with the remote so it constantly turns off during play. I ended up placing a piece of foil in-between and that seems to help for a while but I have to constantly replace the foil because the battery doesn’t fit the remote snuggly so it constantly moves the foil around.
customer_reviews.author: Gio

customer_reviews.title: It could be better
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for obvious reasons. It works... Kind of. One of the charge ports is perfect and charges with no trouble, the other charges but takes longer due to it not making a solid connection with the controllers. It still works but not well. It could definitely be better.
customer_reviews.author: Tosha Testerman

customer_reviews.title: Don't work very well
customer_reviews.text: Hard to take the battery packs off and on remotes. Says it's charged, but then as my son is playing, it starts glitching (showing battery low) shuts off and he can't jump or move, then it starts working again. Ordered another set and will update. Hoping we just received a defective one.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great pricing for this product
customer_reviews.text: These rechargable batteries and charger works very well..one downfall is that one of the batteries seem to drain a little faster then the other when playing the games, but overall still a great product. The price was fairly cheap for these two rechargeable batteries + charger.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: short battery life
customer_reviews.text: i love the recharge feature but the batteries last only about 25% of what standard alkaline batteries do. I think based on the weight they are just smaller capacity and there is more plastic housing.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Dee

customer_reviews.title: I put them on the new controllers with their new battery pack and they turn red like they are charging but then turn blue
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what it is but I can't get these to charge. I bought one similar earlier and had the same problem. I know the controllers have drained batteries. I put them on the new controllers with their new battery pack and they turn red like they are charging but then turn blue. I can't get them to even turn red although the controllers themselves are totally drained. Ready to give up the WII.
customer_reviews.author: Skideeppow

customer_reviews.title: Works well but non-functional charger plug
customer_reviews.text: One battery came with good charge and the other came with no charge. The USB charger plug I received doesn’t work. I have a spare from an old cell phone that I tried and now it’s charging properly. Some instructions would be helpful but aren’t included. I’m not sure if charging 2 remotes at a time lengthens the total charging time or if it doesn’t matter.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W.

customer_reviews.title: Holder not secure, bad battery.
customer_reviews.text: The remotes don't sit very securely in the holder, making it difficult to actually get them to charge. In my case, one of the batteries I received just will not charge beyond 1 bar, making it useless.
customer_reviews.author: S. Pfister

customer_reviews.title: The picture does not tell the whole story
customer_reviews.text: When looking at the image on the webpage it shows to complete controllers but all you get is two batteries and a battery charger I was quite disappointed but for the price it’s a good deal
customer_reviews.author: TIMOTHY

customer_reviews.title: Poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure what all the rave is about...the build quality of this is terrible...Have to wiggle around the charges to get the perfect angle on the stand to charge properly...
customer_reviews.author: M. G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and charges very fast!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for a great price! Charges the paddles very quickly! I reckoned this to anyone with young kids that love to play with their electronics and drains batteries fast! Fully charged in less then a hour!
customer_reviews.author: kendra

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We've had the charger for about two months now, and so far it's great! Hasn't been used a TON, we're trying to spend the summer outside, but every time we go to use our Wii the controllers are charged and ready to go. No issues with them falling off or not charging or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Arreyn Grey

customer_reviews.title: Saving lotsa batteries from going to a landfill
customer_reviews.text: Didn't want to fit my remotes. Had an extra piece of plastic that I had to cut off. But after that it's been working perfectly and worth every penny. Saving a load of batteries already
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: We recently hooked up our Wii system for the 1st time in years. Of course, after all these years, the re-chargeable batteries and battery charger weren't working too well. Ordered this setup and presto! Everything works great, and it's fairly compact so it doesn't take up a lot of room. Charging is fast and the new batteries are great!
customer_reviews.author: D Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: It fit fine, works well. I don't understand the problem
customer_reviews.text: Others wrote they had problems. I have original wii controllers and mine fit in the cradle just fine and charge well. I don't understand how some have had problems but I'm glad it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not a good charger because you have to maneuver the controller for a while to get it right, and that's even with the batteries that are included with the charger. Don't waste your time on this Wii Remote Charger.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Mattox

customer_reviews.title: Wii remote charger
customer_reviews.text: I like this Wii remote charger. It actually works better than the original one I got years ago. It is more stable at holding the remotes upright. Charges quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie H.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good value, replaced older units where battery wasn’t lasting a long time. Only issue is you have to seat the controller just right in order to show it charging. However, for the price, this is not a big issue.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Brown

customer_reviews.title: 1st battery pack snapped off and keeps disconnecting the wii controller....
customer_reviews.text: My first battery pack for one of my controllers suddenly snapped off after it kept on dissconnecting numerous of times after its been fully charged. My other battery pack works just fine. Disappointed that it snapped right off... -_-
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great Equipment
customer_reviews.text: A great product. Battery packs fit well on the wii controllers and it charges pretty quickly. Most importantly it holds the charge. Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Buy some rechargeable batteries and swap them out
customer_reviews.text: Do you have to leave them on the chargers and the charger plugged in around the clock or when you want to use the controllers the batteries are dead
customer_reviews.author: Catmash

customer_reviews.title: Initial Thoughts
customer_reviews.text: We don't use our Wii a lot and the original rechargeable batteries are shot. So when I saw this item and it's price I figured what the heck. Received the item without incident, however instructions are non-existent. The batteries are built into a new battery cover for the controller, I found one of the covers took some force to get it closed, the second one seemed better. I like the charger lights, very easy to see and tell when the batteries are charged.
customer_reviews.author: rmiller

customer_reviews.title: If you order this make sure to test the batteries right away to make sure they hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: This would’ve been five stars had both batteries held their charge one battery lasts three times longer than the other one after a full charge I’ll be returning this and replacing it with another one that hopefully both batteries last like they’re supposed to
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy K

customer_reviews.title: It started to burn
customer_reviews.text: I brought this product a few months and was using fine at first. I had to move out however and didnt use my wii for awhile. Decided to go back and play it reccently and needed to charge my wii controllers. A few moments later i smelled something burning and looked under the charger to see that it burning from the inside . Unplugged it fast and ever since then i stopped using it
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Chery

customer_reviews.title: Works ok.
customer_reviews.text: Better than some cheap models, but the charger is always blue and rarely charges the remotes. Oh well, at least it wasn't expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: So far so good as far as the dock goes. The company didn’t send two battery packs so I have to go order another set. That was a little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my wii for a while now and the original charging station I had wasn’t working anymore so I got this! I am loving it thank you!
customer_reviews.author: sammy2012

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this product at all
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I put the remotes on the charger, only the right side of the charger turned red indicating it was charging the battery. The left side stayed blue which is saying it is fully charged, which it is not. Sending this back ASAP. I do not recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Pettinato

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Getting a chargeable battery pack is a must for wii controllers. These work but you have to play with it to get it to charge. It isnt just sit it down and leave.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Steverson

customer_reviews.title: Was every penny and then some
customer_reviews.text: This charger brace was on point the value of it was on point there's nothing but good things I have to say about this product to thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Michele H.

customer_reviews.title: The charger is acting weird
customer_reviews.text: I cant seem to get the charger to charge properly....They flicker red and blue and then sit in-between other times. The packaging was nice and the batteries fit well but doesnt seem to be working like it should
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Seckora

customer_reviews.title: wonderul and money saver
customer_reviews.text: We were going thru batteries like crazy on our Wii, This has been a wonderful purchase and its paid for itself within a month.
customer_reviews.author: ShopN4Me12

customer_reviews.title: One battery pack seems to be working fine but the second controllers battery pack goes down VERY ...
customer_reviews.text: Edit: Was contacted by the seller who sent me a replacement battery, very good customer service! New battery works fine and now both last a long time. Thank you! Old Review : One battery pack seems to be working fine but the second controllers battery pack goes down VERY fast. It doesn't seem to be holding a very good charge. So... It half works, other than that no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Davidlito

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: Take a little maneuvering to place remotes in so they touch electrodes to charge but the light changes red when its in the right spot. Lights for the whole thing are a bit bright in a dark room but otherwise very happy with the cost and quality
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was happy to get this charger. We have been through 2 new ones. I hope this one lasts longer....Arrived in timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C

customer_reviews.title: No more batteries
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness. No more batteries. Works great and sturdy. Make sure you still use the wrist strap. On my second tv :)
customer_reviews.author: Amilmft

customer_reviews.title: Beware sparks when you plug into outlet
customer_reviews.text: Received today daughter plugged into outlet and it sparked and broke. Turned the outlet part black. Very scary
customer_reviews.author: R. Kramer

customer_reviews.title: The unit with the battery packs are fine but I bought since it came with a transformer ...
customer_reviews.text: The unit with the battery packs are fine but I bought since it came with a transformer that allowed the USB cord to be used independently. The little small transformer does not work. I am using my cell phone one now but be careful as I am not sure if it is the right amperage.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This was a complete waste of money. The wii remotes don’t seem to sit in the charger properly because it’ll turn red, then blue, then purple depending on how it sits and if you touch the second remote: one that may have been showing up blue (meaning charged), turns out not to be anymore and vice versa. I’ll take it out of the charger and start using it, to soon realize it wasn’t actually charged.
customer_reviews.author: Tatianna

customer_reviews.title: Works like brand new
customer_reviews.text: I bought some replacement batteries for the Wii remotes and plugged them into the new charger I bought. They charged up quickly and worked like new
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Samantha R Jackson

customer_reviews.title: 2 months in, working great
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how to evaluate the battery life, as we are new Wii users. But these fit the aftermarket motion-plus controllers just fine and run long enough for us to play a couple games as a family in the evenings.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: It's cheap, I was better off buying nyko
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this but only 1 battery pack works most of the time, I leave them to charge and only one works, the other is always dying, the charging station doesn't charge on one end so I have to charge each at a time eventhough the other just refuses to charge I'm able to get 1 light out of 4 to stay on!
customer_reviews.author: TheOneAndOnly

customer_reviews.title: Batteries fit, Charger won’t fully charge them
customer_reviews.text: The Good: The batteries fit original remotes The Bad: The charger fails to fully charge the batteries. As others report, the charging light and cycle stops often and randomly, long before fully charging either or both batteries.
customer_reviews.author: CarsonNPR

customer_reviews.title: One is defective and no way to contact the company
customer_reviews.text: One of the two does not work, so we only have one working remote. Amazon says there is no way to contact the seller, so that's is very frustrating. Good product, if it works which mine does not.
customer_reviews.author: LC Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Charging station
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know yet how long the batteries will be good, but this charger works fast and right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: G. Tansey

product_meta.title: Kulannder Wii Remote Battery Charger(Free USB Wall Charger+Lengthened Cord) Dual Charging Station Dock with Two Rechargeable Capacity Increased Batteries for Wii/Wii U Game Remote Controller (White)
product_meta.description:
Specifications:
1. Color: White
2. Input voltage: DC 5V
3. Output voltage: DC 2.8 V*2
4. Output current: 800 MA*2
5. Static power dissipation: 2.8MA
What you get:
1* Remote Controller Charging Station
2* Rechargeable Batteries
1* 5 ft long USB Cable
1*USB AC Adapter
kindly notice :
Wii Remote Controllers Not Included.
make sure the remotes are in right postition when you put the remotes sit into the base untill the light turn red.
feature_bullets: CONVENIENT CONNECT POWER: come with 5' long USB power cord and USB AC adapter , mutiple choice for you to Charge through :Wii console, computer,TV with USB port,or USB wall outlet plug.
ECONOMY & ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION- Save a lot of money and protect the environment by using the rechargeable battery,perfect alterbative of disposable AA batteries.

HIGHER CAPACITY BATTERY - matiral changed from Nickel-cadmium to nickel metal hydride, so improved 200% capacity compare with those normal 2800mAl rechargeable battery, lasts 3~5 times longer than the standard AA batteries. and The rechargeable battery pack fits perfectly on the motion plus controllers,kids so happy playing games without dead power worry.
COOL LED LIGHT INDICATOR - easy to read, red for charging or blue for fully charged

EASY TO STORE: extremely lightweight and fully portable, takes up about as much surface area as the average cell phone, easily stored away when it's not in use. Perfect for someone who doesn't like clutter or doesn't have much shelf space available.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,467 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Manufacturer: with Two Rechargeable capacity Increased Batteries for Wii /Wii U Game Remote Controller
